snippet: Buffeted by a bad economy and rising unemployment and facing angry voters, France’s Socialists are sniping at their own leaders.
abstract: News analysis; French Socialist Party, just five months after victory of Socialist Francois Hollande in France's presidential election, is plagued by in-fighting and country's economic woes.
lead_paragraph: Buffeted by a bad economy and rising unemployment and facing angry voters, France’s Socialists are sniping at their own leaders.

headline.seo: For France’s Socialists, a Breakdown in Fraternité
headline.main: French Socialists, Under Fire, Display a Lack of Fraternité
headline.print_headline: French Socialists, Under Fire, Display a Lack of Fraternité
